{"application": "deepspeed", "software": ["python", "torch", "deepspeed", "pytorch", "transformers"], "modules": ["six_ALL_CCFRWORK/start-tr13f-6B3-ml-t0", "Megatron-DeepSpeed/finetune_t0.py"], "environment_variables": {"TRANSFORMERS_CACHE": "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/models", "HF_DATASETS_CACHE": "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/datasets", "HF_MODULES_CACHE": "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/modules", "HF_METRICS_CACHE": "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/metrics", "HF_DATASETS_OFFLINE": "1", "TRANSFORMERS_OFFLINE": "1", "CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING": "1", "TORCHELASTIC_ERROR_FILE": "/tmp/torch-elastic-error.json", "LAUNCHER": "python -u -m torch.distributed.run

    --nnodes $NNODES 
    --rdzv_endpoint $MASTER_ADDR:$MASTER_PORT

    --max_restarts 0 
    --tee 3 
    ", "CMD": "

    --tensor-model-parallel-size $TP_SIZE

    $OUTPUT_ARGS 
    --save $CHECKPOINT_PATH

    --train-weighted-split-paths-path $TRAIN_DATA_PATH 
    --valid-weighted-split-paths-path $VALID_DATA_PATH 
    --dataloader-type single 
    --data-impl mmap 
    --distributed-backend nccl
